name: Twitch Back
description:
Twitch Back is a puzzle game with some platformer mechanics, the goal is to pass the different levels proposed and for this you have to follow your past actions traced by ghosts that represent your old lives.

 Information:

Twitch Back is a group student game in the backyard of my first year of study.

 A first version of the game was made in a group of 6 people. The idea came from the main mechanics, a ghost that traces our past path, had to make a 3d game on unity. From there we decided on a digital/neon universe.

 The project had a second development period over three weeks and this time the group had 11 people, have then decided to review the gameplay of the game so that it is more faithful to what one had promised, it is then that we have reviewed the code of the game and the mechanic of the phantom. The artistic direction was reworked as whole, it’s the same for the Level Design which was mostly rebalanced. After that a trailer to view the day and the project came to an end.

Teams :

- Game Design : Onesti Enzo / Crespel Alexandre / Broussaud Gaspard / Leroux Ludovic

- Level Design : Leroux Ludovic / Crespel Alexandre

- Programming : Broussaud Gaspard / Onesti Enzo / Guillemot Antoine

- 3D : Babef Yann / Messinese Bastien / Guillemot Antoine

- 2D : Toussaint Clara

- Sound Design : Cecchi Thierry

- Trailer/Logo  :  Forgue Arnaud / Cecchi Thierry
